articles.author: Adam Cooper
articles.title: Leclerc summoned by Australian GP stewards - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Australian GP pole-sitter Charles Leclerc has been summoned by the FIA Formula 1 stewards for driving unnecessarily slowly on an in-lap during qualifying.
articles.content:
Zhou Guanyu and Yuki Tsunoda have also been called by the stewards for similar offences.
Leclerc and Zhou's transgressions happened at the same time in Q1, while Tsunoda's was in Q2.

articles.title: Charles Leclerc takes out pole position in F1 qualifying at the Australian Grand Prix, Daniel Ricciardo qualifies seventh - ABC News
articles.description: Ferrari driver Charles Leclerc has taken his second pole position in three races, with a blistering lap in Melbourne, setting him up for tomorrow's F1 Australian Grand Prix.
articles.content:
Ferrari driver Charles Leclerc has taken his second pole position in three F1 grand prix races.

articles.title: Spotify tests music discovery feed like TikTok - Economic Times
articles.description: It is testing a new experience for Spotify users (across the UK, Ireland, Australia, New Zealand, and Canada) where they can find new music and check out Canvas loops in a personalised feed that lives on the home screen of the mobile app.
articles.content:
New Delhi:Music streaming service Spotify is testing a personalised feed on the app's home screen like the Chinese short-video making platform TikTok to help users discover music easily.

articles.title: New COVID-19 variant Deltacron has been detected in Australia, here's what we know - ABC News
articles.description: Genomic sequencing picks up Deltacron in Australia for the first time this week, with the variant described as a hybrid between Delta and Omicron. Here's what we know so far.
articles.content:
A new variant of COVID-19 has been detected in Australia, which is a hybrid of two previous strains.
